name: SEPTEMBER 1999
summary:
A free, VHS styled, first-person found footage horror game, which runs exactly for 5 minutes and 30 seconds.
Controls:
Move: WASD
Zoom: Right-click
Pause: Escape

(You can rebind the keys at the window you choose your resolution from)

Follow my future shenanigans on Twitter @98demake.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 发行日期: 2018年9月18日
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/952250/SEPTEMBER_1999/
